title: repairing
body: when i opened LoL it says "repairing" and after this i cant join any game or reconnect, how i can fix it?

replies.body: The client attempting to repair indicates that some game files may have become corrupt, and is trying to fix it.  The issue you're having currently may be unrelated to that though, and might result from a connection problem reaching the game server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix that up.
